notes: Machine learning algorithms can predict stock prices
Neural networks are inspired by biological neurons
Python is a popular programming language for data science
Deep learning requires large amounts of training data
Quantum computing uses quantum mechanical phenomena
The theory of relativity revolutionized physics
Black holes have an event horizon
Gravity is a fundamental force in the universe
The speed of light is constant in a vacuum
Mathematics is the language of science
Calculus deals with rates of change
Linear algebra is essential for machine learning
Probability theory helps in statistical inference
Graph theory studies networks and connections
Transformer models use self-attention mechanisms.
Backpropagation calculates gradients for weight updates.
Llama-3 is a dense decoder-only transformer architecture.
Reinforcement learning involves agents, environments, and rewards.
Overfitting occurs when a model learns noise instead of signal.
Dropout is a regularization technique to prevent overfitting.
Embeddings map discrete tokens to continuous vector spaces.
RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) connects LLMs to private data.
Sous vide requires precise temperature control for water baths.
The Maillard reaction creates browning and flavor in seared meat.
Sourdough starters rely on wild yeast fermentation.
Proper knife skills increase safety and chopping speed.
Emulsions like mayonnaise require slowly adding oil to yolks.
Black holes have an event horizon from which light cannot escape.
General relativity describes gravity as the curvature of spacetime.
The James Webb telescope observes infrared light from early stars.
Neutron stars are the collapsed cores of massive stars.
Dark matter accounts for most of the mass in the universe.
React's useEffect hook handles side effects in components.
FastAPI uses Pydantic for data validation.
WebSockets allow for full-duplex communication channels.
Tailwind CSS uses utility classes for rapid styling.
Docker containers package applications with all dependencies.
